thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 12 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Huaiji Dengyun Auto-parts Holding receives patent license

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Huaiji Dengyun Auto-parts Holding receives patent license

organizations.name: reuters) - huaiji dengyun auto-parts holding co ltd

text:
Feb 13(Reuters) - Huaiji Dengyun Auto-parts Holding Co Ltd
* Says it received a patent license (No. ZL201310373260.9), for outer diameter v-shaped measurement method and v-shaped gauge of valve retainer outer diameter
* Patent valid for 20 years
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/Rg1YBC
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
